io.delta.kernel.client

Interface ParquetHandler


  • public interface ParquetHandler
    Provides Parquet file related functionalities to Delta Kernel. Connectors can leverage this interface to provide their own custom implementation of Parquet data file functionalities to Delta Kernel.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  ParquetHandler.ParquetDataReadResult
      Data read from a Parquet file with FileStatus attached.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Associate a connector specific FileReadContext for each given FileStatus.

      Read the Parquet format file at given location and return the data.

      Read the given Parquet file path and return the footer information.

    • Method Detail

      • readParquetFooter

        io.delta.kernel.parquet.ParquetFooter readParquetFooter(java.lang.String filePath)
        Read the given Parquet file path and return the footer information.
        Parameters:
        filePath - Fully qualified Parquet file path.
        Returns:
        A ParquetFooter populated from the Parquet file.

      • contextualizeFiles

        CloseableIterator<Tuple2<FileStatus,FileReadContext>> contextualizeFiles(CloseableIterator<FileStatus> fileIter,
                                                                         Expression predicate)
        Associate a connector specific FileReadContext for each given FileStatus. The Delta Kernel uses the returned pair of FileStatus and FileReadContext to request data from the connector. Delta Kernel doesn't interpret the FileReadContext. It just passes it back to the connector for interpretation. For example the connector can attach split information in its own implementation of FileReadContext or attach any predicates.
        Parameters:
        fileIter - Iterator of FileStatus
        predicate - Predicate to use prune file list. This is optional for the connector to use. Delta Kernel doesn't require the connector filtering the data by this predicate.
        Returns:
        Itearator of FileStatus and FileReadContext typles to read data from.

      • readParquetFiles

        CloseableIterator<ParquetHandler.ParquetDataReadResult> readParquetFiles(CloseableIterator<Tuple2<FileStatus,FileReadContext>> fileIter,
                                                                         StructType physicalSchema,
                                                                         java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> partitionValues)
                                                                  throws java.io.IOException
        Read the Parquet format file at given location and return the data.
        Parameters:
        fileIter - Iterator of (FileStatus, FileReadContext) objects to read data from.
        physicalSchema - Select list of columns to read from the Parquet file.
        Returns:
        an iterator of data in columnar format. It is the responsibility of the caller to close the iterator. The data returned is in the same as the order of files given in fileIter.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs during the read.
